neg review: Room was small, no airco and way too expensive for the quality. Even though we booked for 3 persons their was only 2 sets of towels.

pos review: The bed was super comfortable and the hotel was in a fab location!!
neg review: The walls were paper thin so was noisy from the room next to me but nothing too bad

pos review:
The reception was super nice
It's right in the city center and we had great views

neg review: no idea where to park Although kettle supplied no wall sockets worked. no charging of phones laptop was possible appeared to be mid update.  The bed was comfortable to sleep but as only one chair bed was too soft to sit on. we had to stay 2 nights as we had app with a vet for dog

pos review: Nice clean place easy location and reasonable rates. Great for family on a budget or couple on 2-3 days stop over
neg review: I luv the hotel but the booking.com website is not very clear so I advise people look on site then contact hotel direct.

pos review: Friendly welcome and room size. Perfect location.
